title: my account disappeared
body: So I logged into my account for the first time in a couple of years this week. I couldn't remember my username and password, so I did the recovery. When I actually logged in, it prompted me to pick a new Summoner Name, and everything that I had in my account was gone. Characters, skins, friends, everything. Any idea what happened?

replies.body: Looking into this and based on what you're saying, I'm convinced you might be logging into a wrong account.  It looks like you do have a ticket open currently, and a specialist who is assisting you.  Hang tight while this is reviewed, and we'll help as much as we can!

HI
i am from, EUW, and i have an issue off my account being disappeared, my Summoner name is, Best Akali Gb, i had taken a few months of break from league coming back, my account is being disappeared. trying to login but is say's this account does not exist. Now i do have small clue of why it might have been disappeared. it might be reported and suspended account for reason of being boosted or something. because i jumped from Silver to diamond. with one champion Akali. as i am an akali main. other than this i am actually shocked to where my account has gone. can you guys investigate and let me know  if possible.

you can send your respond on this email. Navidcrahimi17@gmail.com as i am not connected to the rest of my emails.

I don't think that there's any other account I could have been using before.
Edit: also thank you so much for the help <3
